instruction: Generate a funny story that includes the input string.
output: Once upon a time, a little lizard wanted to join the circus. He practiced hard everyday perfecting his act, but no matter how hard he tried, he couldn't keep up with any of the other animals in the show. But one day, the ringmaster noticed his determination and invited him to join the show. The little lizard was so excited and used his skills to dazzle the audience with his amazing tricks. From that day on, the little lizard was known as the star of the show!
